projects-main.thumbnail_description: An app to create and explore courses
Create, search and modify books with this library manager.
A rebuild of the clothing brand, Rains

projects.thumbnail_description: An app to create and explore courses
projects.project_description: A React client that connects to a school database REST API back end. Users can discover courses, create accounts or sign in to existing accounts, and create, view, and modify courses.

projects.thumbnail_description: Create, search and modify books with this library manager.
projects.project_description: A library database manager. Perform field search queries and CRUD operations. Built with Express, Pug, and Sequelize.

projects.thumbnail_description: A rebuild of the clothing brand, Rains
projects.project_description: This app is a simplified rebuild of the clothing brand "Rains". A user can view a wide range of products, select an item's color, sizing and purchase desired items. Mobile responsive. Built with React.

projects.thumbnail_description: Search and generate a gallery of photos from Flickr's API
projects.project_description: Tap into Flickr's database to retrieve a range of photos based on a search.

projects.thumbnail_description: Paginated student list with search filter
projects.project_description: A once long list of students remodeled into a paginated list with a search bar. All made with vanilla JavaScript.

projects.thumbnail_description: A simple application that accesses an api to generate and map employee data
projects.project_description: A program that's designed for employees to connect with one another. Data is pulled from the "randomuser" api and maps each employee into their own clickable employee card.

projects.thumbnail_description: A form that processes and validates user data
projects.project_description: With the power of jQuery comes a functional and engaging 'fill-out' form for a conference event. The user can select a job role, t-shirt options, activity workshops and more.

projects.thumbnail_description: A game which gives you five tries to guess a phrase
projects.project_description: This games gives a user five tries to guess from an array of popular phrases. Can you guess them all?
